introduction: Hi, my name is Chris.  I'm a full-stack developer and entrepreneur that loves helping people through technology.  I've worked in / helped build a number of startup organizations and am also an avid open source advocate and contributor.  I believe that technology has an unmeasurable ability to touch peoples' lives for the better and work every day to strengthen that impact.

education.title: Graduated from Purdue University
education.description: with a BS in Computer Science

experience.title: Developer at OneAmerica
experience.description: Developed internal systems and tools for OneAmerica, a mutual insurance holding company

experience.title: CTO / Lead Developer at WiseCampus.com
experience.description: Developed system for students to share class notes and get rewarded with gift cards

experience.title: Director of DC Operations at inSourceCode LLC
experience.description: Managed all DC-area clients and development for inSourceCode.  This included custom applications in PHP and Javascript as well as extensive Wordpress development

experience.title: Lead Developer at OpenGov Foundation
experience.description: As first employee and lead developer, created and managed many OSS projects in various languages and technologies.  Some, but not all, include custom PHP, Laravel, AngularJS, NodeJS, Wordpress, Jekyll, and Python

experience.title: Member Board of Directors at OpenGov Foundation
experience.description: Served as one of the original members of the Board of Directors for the OpenGov Foundation

experience.title: Owner / CEO at Divide By Zero LLC
experience.description: Started LLC to help support a growing civic technology community
